name: NotificationCenter
desc: A notification dispatch mechanism that enables the broadcast of information to registered observers.

items.name: addObserver
items.desc: Adds an entry to the notification center's dispatch table with an observer and a notification selector, and an optional notification name and sender.

items.name: removeObserver
items.desc: Removes matching entries from the notification center's dispatch table.

items.name: removeObserver
items.desc: Removes all entries specifying a given observer from the notification center's dispatch table.

items.name: post
items.desc: Posts a given notification to the notification center.

items.name: post
items.desc: Creates a notification with a given name and sender and posts it to the notification center.

items.name: publisher
items.desc: Returns a publisher that emits events when broadcasting notifications.
